questions.question: What is the yield percentage of the crystal synthesis for Nd(NO3)3·6H2O?
What is the temperature range for the removal of guest water molecules in the TGA analysis of La(NO3)3·6H2O?
Based on the synthesis conditions, which lanthanide ions were used to achieve the infinite lanthanide hydroxide chains?
Is the magnetic susceptibility of Nd3+ ions in the 4I9/2 ground state higher at 300 K than the observed value for compound 1?
What is the coordination geometry of Nd1 or Nd3 in the synthesized compounds?
Does the synthesis of [Ln3(μ3-OH)3(Pra2biim)3(H2O)]n·4nH2O involve hydrothermal hydrolysis?
What is the role of NaOH in the synthesis of [Ln3(μ3-OH)3(Pra2biim)3(H2O)]n·4nH2O?
questions.answer: NaOH is used in the presence of H2Pra2biim to produce the crystals of 1–3.

questions.question: Are the crystals of 1–3 optically active?
What is the pitch of the right-handed helical chain formed by Nd3+ ions in compound 1?
Does the decrease in wMT product with temperature for compound 1 indicate antiferromagnetic interactions?
What is the significance of the unique H2Pra2biim–Ln(NO3)3 hydrolysis system in the synthesis?
questions.answer: It yielded the first example of an infinite lanthanide hydroxide chain.

questions.question: Are the coordination environments of three independent Nd atoms identical?
What is the maximum magnetization value reached by compound 2 at 7T and 2K?
Does the synthesis process of [Ln3(μ3-OH)3(Pra2biim)3(H2O)]n·4nH2O involve cooling after heating in an autoclave?
What is the crystal system of the synthesized compounds?
Is the pitch of the helical chain formed by La3+ ions longer than that formed by Nd3+ ions?
What is the role of the propionate arms of Pra2biim2(cid:2) in the structure of the synthesized compounds?
questions.answer: They interconnect the hexagonally arranged [Nd3(m3-OH)3]n6n+ chains into an open framework structure.

questions.question: Are the synthesized compounds isomorphous?
What is the observed weight loss percentage for the removal of coordination aqua molecules in compound 1?
Does the presence of magnetic anisotropy and/or low lying excited states affect the M-H/T plots of compounds 1 and 2?
